amendment.description: Amendment increases the contribution limits for House candidates from $1,000 to $2,000 and indexes this amount for inflation in future years.
amendment.purpose: Amendment number 12 printed in the Congressional Record February 12, 2002 to increase the limit on individual hard money contributions to House candidates from $1,000 per election to $2,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 211 (Roll no. 28).
